<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:льнуть.html>льнуть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lʹnutʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепка.html>ле́пка</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lépka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">сле́пок</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">slépok</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">облепи́ха</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">oblepíxa</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:пить.html>пи́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4c④.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <span>приставочные <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>ти́па</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:вылепить.html>вы́лепить</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:залепить.html>залепи́ть</a>, излепить, <a href = vnd.unilang:налепить.html>налепи́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:облепить.html>облепи́ть</a>,
<a href = vnd.unilang:прилепить.html>прилепи́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:слепить.html>слепи́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-леп-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***лепиться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лепиться.html>лепи́ться</a> (20179)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепить.html>лепи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">lepítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепиться.html>лепи́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lepítʹsja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепной.html>лепно́й</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lepnój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:пить.html>пи́ть</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4c(4).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-леп-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>леп<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-леп-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-н-ин</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="архитектурный термин">архит.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:рельефный.html>релье́фные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:украшение.html>украше́ния</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:фигурный.html>фигу́рные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> орнаментальные) <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:фасад.html>фаса́дах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:интерьер.html>интерье́рах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:здание.html>зда́ний</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:правило.html>правило</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:отлитый.html>отлитые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> отпрессованные <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:гипс.html>ги́пса</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:штукатурка.html>штукату́рки</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:бетон.html>бето́на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>други́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:материал.html>материа́лов</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>Во</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:внутренний.html>вну́треннем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:убранство.html>убра́нстве</a> Растрелли <a href = vnd.unilang:любить.html>лю́бит</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:изобилие.html>изобилие</a> ― <a href = vnd.unilang:изобилие.html>изобилие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цвет.html>цвета</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:изобилие.html>изобилие</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепнина.html>лепни́ны</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:изобилие.html>изобилие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:узор.html>узо́ра</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Еремеева, «<a href = vnd.unilang:лекция.html>Ле́кции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сскому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:искусство.html>иску́сству</a>», <span class="example-date">2000</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>частичн.: <a href = vnd.unilang:лепка.html>ле́пка</a></li>

</body> 
***лепной.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лепной.html>лепно́й</a> (25507)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепить.html>лепи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">lepítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-но́й</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепной.html>лепно́й</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lepnój</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>modelled, moulded
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лепной.html>лепно́е</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:украшение.html>украше́ние</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>lepnóje</b> ukrašénije</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:stucco.html>stucco</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:moulding.html>moulding</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепить.html>лепи́ть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lepítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепка.html>ле́пка</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lépka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>леп<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ныть.html>но́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>Кра́ткая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остальной.html>остальны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>кра́тких</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднительный.html>затрудни́тельно</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-леп-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:иметь.html>име́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:четкий.html>чёткие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рельефный.html>релье́фные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:очертание.html>очерта́ния</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:огонек.html>Огонёк</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сигарета.html>сигаре́ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:высвечивать.html>высве́чивал</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:породистый.html>поро́дистый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нос.html>нос</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:крупный.html>кру́пные</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***лепта.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лепта.html>ле́пта</a> (27081)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">λεπτόν</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">leptón</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:neuter.html>neuter</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">λεπτός</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">leptós</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепта.html>ле́пта</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lépta</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепта.html>ле́пты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепта.html>ле́пты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепта.html>ле́пт</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>lepton <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:coin.html>coin</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:idiomatic.html>idiomatic</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:mite.html>mite</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:two.html>two</a> cents, (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:contribution.html>contribution</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ле́п<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>та</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лепт-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***лепящий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лепящий.html>ле́пящий</a> (8879)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепящий.html>ле́пящий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lépjaščij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лепить.html>лепи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">lepítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***лес.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a> (280)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">лѣсъ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">lěsŭ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*lěsъ</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>ле́са</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>леса́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесо́в</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li class="senseid" id="Russian-forest"> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:wood.html>woods</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>леса́</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">lesá</i> ― <span class="e-translation">woodland, forests</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:девственный.html>де́вственный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">dévstvennyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:virgin.html>virgin</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:primeval.html>primeval</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:заповедный.html>запове́дный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">zapovédnyj <a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>means</a>:
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:заповедник.html>запове́дник</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">zapovédnik</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:protection.html>protection</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тайный.html>та́йный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:священный.html>свяще́нный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:божий.html>бо́жий</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:poetic.html>poetic</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">tájnyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b>, svjaščénnyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b>, bóžij <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:sacred.html>sacred</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:that.html>that</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nobody.html>nobody</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:may.html>may</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:enter.html>enter</a></span></div></dd></dl></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:корабельный.html>корабе́льный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">korabélʹnyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:ship.html>ship</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:timber.html>timber</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лиственный.html>ли́ственный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">lístvennyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">leaf-bearing <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:смешанный.html>сме́шанный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">sméšannyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:mixed.html>mixed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тропический.html>тропи́ческий</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">tropíčeskij <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:rainforest.html>rainforest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хвойный.html>хво́йный</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">xvójnyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:coniferous.html>coniferous</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чаща.html>ча́ща</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>леса</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">čášča lesa</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:thicket.html>thicket</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> depths <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шум.html>шум</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>леса</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">šum lesa</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:murmur.html>murmur</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесу́</a></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:say.html>saying</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">kak <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> lesú</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sea.html>sea</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:lose.html>lost</a>, disoriented</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дрова.html>дрова́</a></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:proverb.html>proverb</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">kto <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b>, kto <a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> drová</i> ― <span class="e-translation">(<a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:six.html>sixes</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> sevens</span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:some.html>some</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:go.html>go</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:some.html>some</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:go.html>go</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:firewood.html>firewood</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубить.html>ру́бят</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:щепка.html>ще́пки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лететь.html>летя́т</a></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:proverb.html>proverb</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b> rúbjat — ščépki letját</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:can.html>can</a>’<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:make.html>make</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:omelette.html>omelette</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:without.html>without</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:break.html>breaking</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:egg.html>eggs</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:when.html>when</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cutting.html>cutting</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tree.html>trees</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:chips.html>chips</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fly.html>fly</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> тёмный <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:say.html>saying</a><span class="ib-comma qualifier-comma">,</span> figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">(dlja nevó) éto tjómnyj <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:him.html>him</a>), (<a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>he</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:completely.html>completely</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dark.html>dark</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:about.html>about</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dark.html>dark</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:him.html>him</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дремучий.html>дрему́чий</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:say.html>saying</a><span class="ib-comma qualifier-comma">,</span> figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">(dlja nevó) éto dremúčij <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:him.html>him</a>), (<a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>he</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:completely.html>completely</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dark.html>dark</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:about.html>about</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dark.html>dark</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:him.html>him</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесу́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>лю́ди</a> лесеют, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>лю́дях</a> людеют</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:proverb.html>proverb</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> lesú ljúdi lesejut, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> ljúdjax ljudejut</i> ― <small>(<a href = vnd.unilang:please.html>please</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:add.html>add</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:translation.html>translation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:example.html>example</a>)</small> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:people.html>people</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:become.html>become</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wild.html>wild</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:become.html>become</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:people.html>people</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:among.html>among</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:people.html>people</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:чей.html>чей</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>того́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пень.html>пень</a></i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:proverb.html>proverb</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">čej <b><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></b>, tovó <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> penʹ</i> ― <small>(<a href = vnd.unilang:please.html>please</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:add.html>add</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:english.html>English</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:translation.html>translation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>this</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:example.html>example</a>)</small> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:man.html>man</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:who.html>who</a> owns <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:also.html>also</a> owns <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:stump.html>stump</a></span>”)</div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бог.html>Бог</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>ле́су</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> сравня́л</i> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:say.html>saying</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:box.html>Box</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <b>lésu</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> sravnjál</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:people.html>people</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:not.html>not</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:equal.html>equal</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><a href = vnd.unilang:god.html>God</a> doesn’<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:even.html>even</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:make.html>make</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:equal.html>equal</a></span>”)</div></dd></dl></li>
<li>(<a href = vnd.unilang:only.html>only</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a></i>) <a href = vnd.unilang:lumber.html>lumber</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:timber.html>timber</a>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></b> (<span title="написание в дореформенной орфографии" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">дореформ.</span> <span style="font-family: | Palatino Linotype | ">лѣсъ</span>)
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1c①  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка). <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ниях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>ти́па</a> «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесу</a></i>», «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>и́з</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесу</a></i>» <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́г</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a> «<i><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i>» <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:превращаться.html>превраща́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> клитику.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***лесбиянка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесбиянка.html>лесбия́нка</a> (17108)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесбиянка.html>лесбия́нка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesbijánka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесбиянка.html>лесбия́нки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесбиянка.html>лесбия́нки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесбиянка.html>лесбия́нок</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:lesbian.html>lesbian</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>би<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>я́н<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лесби-</b>; суффикс: <b>-янк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***лесенка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенка</a> (10987)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lésenka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенок</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лестница.html>ле́стница</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">léstnica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: (<a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:flight.html>flight</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:stair.html>stairs</a>; (<a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:ladder.html>ladder</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ле́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:сена.html>се́н</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффикс: <b>-енк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:последовательный.html>после́довательное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:расположение.html>расположе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уступ.html>усту́пами</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:много.html>мно́го</a> больше бленды, светильня <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> потолще <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> какие-то <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a> угольчатые <a href = vnd.unilang:стеклышко.html>стёклышки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:круговой.html>кругово́й</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенкой</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:ставиться.html>ста́вились</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:главный.html>Гла́вная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сила.html>си́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́тих</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стеклышко.html>стёклышках</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>да</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесенка.html>ле́сенка</a></span> прогиб <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>дала́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:либо.html>ли́бо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:какой.html>како́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стеклышко.html>стёклышко</a> замутилось, <a href = vnd.unilang:сразу.html>сра́зу</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:шахтный.html>ша́хтном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двор.html>дворе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:темный.html>темно́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́нет</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%9F%D0%B0%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BB_%D0%9F%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Бажов, Павел Петрович">П. П. Бажов</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:круговой.html>Кругово́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:фонарь.html>Фона́рь</a>», <span class="example-date">1944</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

***лесина.html

<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:си.html>си́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. ***лесистый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесистый.html>леси́стый</a> (16041)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесистый.html>леси́стый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesístyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:woody.html>woody</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:wooded.html>wooded</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:timbered.html>timbered</a>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:си.html>си́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>стый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>леси́стее, леси́стей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ист</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:никнуть.html>ни́к</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, адъективное <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффикс: <b>-нич</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:заведующий.html>заве́дующий</a> лесничеством, <a href = vnd.unilang:лесной.html>лесны́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хозяйство.html>хозя́йством</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span title="пропуск одного или нескольких предложений в цитируемом тексте" style="cursor: help">❬…❭</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:когда.html>Когда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:маленький.html>ма́ленькая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сиротка.html>сиро́тка</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:внучек.html>внучка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:старый.html>ста́рого</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> притяжательное, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — местоименное <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> 6*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-нич-ий</b>.
</p>

***лесной.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесной.html>лесно́й</a> (1914)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-но́й</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nój</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесной.html>лесно́й</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesnój</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:wood.html>wood</a>

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лесной.html>лесно́й</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:орех.html>оре́х</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>lesnój</b> oréx</i> ― <span class="e-translation">hazelnut, <a href = vnd.unilang:filbert.html>filbert</a></span> (<a href = vnd.unilang:literally.html>literally</a>, “<span class="e-literally"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:forest.html>forest</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:nut.html>nut</a></span>”)</div></dd>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ныть.html>но́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1b | .
<a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>Кра́ткая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рма</a> муж. р. <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:использоваться.html>испо́льзуется</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:образование.html>образова́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остальной.html>остальны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:краткий.html>кра́тких</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рм</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затруднительный.html>затрудни́тельно</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:порядочный.html>-н</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ой</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:связанный.html>свя́занный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>ле́сом</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:обитать.html>обита́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лесу</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***лесовоз.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесовоз.html>лесово́з</a> (24608)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:воз.html>воз</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">voz</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:combine.html>combining</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:возить.html>вози́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">vozítʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:convey.html>convey</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.

***лесозаготовка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесозаготовка.html>лесозагото́вка</a> (28687)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:заготовка.html>загото́вка</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">zagotóvka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесозаготовка.html>лесозагото́вка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesozagotóvka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесозаготовка.html>лесозагото́вки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесозаготовка.html>лесозагото́вки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесозаготовка.html>лесозагото́вок</a></b>)
</p>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">лесозаготови́тельный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">lesozagotovítelʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>го<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>то́в<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; интерфикс: <b>-о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>приста́вка</a>: <b>за-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-готов-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="экономическое">экон.</span><a href = vnd.unilang:заготовка.html>загото́вка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесной.html>лесны́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:материал.html>материа́лов</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:древесина.html>древеси́ны</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:дед.html>Дед</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мать.html>матери</a> ― Абрам Ильич ― <a href = vnd.unilang:работать.html>рабо́тал</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:десятник.html>деся́тником</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***лесок.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>лесок</a> (6627)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ок</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ok</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>лесо́к</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesók</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>леска́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>лески́</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесок.html>леско́в</a></b>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:сок.html>со́к</a></b> (<span title="написание в дореформенной орфографии" style="border-bottom: 1px dotted; cursor: help">дореформ.</span> <span style="font-family: | Palatino Linotype | ">лѣсокъ</span>)
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:b.html>b</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-лес-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ок</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;cursor:help;" title="уменьшительно-ласкательное">уменьш.-ласк.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́ешь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тот</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трава.html>травы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:столько.html>сто́лько</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:можно.html>мо́жно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:каждый.html>ка́ждый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>год</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:продавать.html>продава́ть</a> больше, <a href = vnd.unilang:чем.html>чем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сто.html>сто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рубле́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:особенно.html>осо́бенно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говоря́т</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> Гадяче <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бу́дет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:конный.html>ко́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полк.html>полк</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Гоголь, Николай Васильевич">Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. Гоголь</a>, «Иван Федорович Шпонька <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тетушка.html>тётушка</a>», <span class="example-date">1831—1832</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***лесопилка.html

***лесоповал.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесоповал.html>лесопова́л</a> (19440)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоповал.html>лесопова́л</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesopovál</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоповал.html>лесопова́ла</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоповал.html>лесопова́лы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоповал.html>лесопова́лов</a></b>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ле<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вал.html>ва́л</a></b>

***лесоруб.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:лесоруб.html>лесору́б</a> (17657)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лес.html>лес</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:les.html>les</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-руб</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-rub</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:combine.html>combining</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:form.html>form</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:рубить.html>руби́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">rubítʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:chop.html>chop</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоруб.html>лесору́б</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">lesorúb</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоруб.html>лесору́ба</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоруб.html>лесору́бы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:лесоруб.html>лесору́бов</a></b>)
</p>
